author: Anonymous Scale
title: SPD Handin
question:
Hi,
I've run into a problem where I'm not getting an email back after clicking submit. It says "submission successful" but I'm not getting an email. I've made sure to save the file into a separate folder, my username and my password are correct, I've checked my spam folder and I've tried doing this numerous times today with no luck. It was working yesterday and the day before so I'm not quite sure what the problem is right now. 

Any help is appreciated!
Thanks!
